actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the application of the Medicare payment rate floor to primary care services furnished under Medicaid and to apply the rate floor to additional providers of primary care services.
short_title: Ensuring Access to Primary Care for Women & Children Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

titles.title: Ensuring Access to Primary Care for Women & Children Act

To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the application of the Medicare payment rate floor to primary care services furnished under Medicaid and to apply the rate floor to additional providers of primary care services.
